summary: This test module validates the behavior of the LSF environment plugin, ensuring it correctly interprets LSF-specific environment variables, detects when it is running under LSF, parses rank files to assign node ranks, and handles edge cases such as missing or empty rank files and manual configuration of main address and port.
business_intent: Guarantee reliable integration of the LSF job scheduler with the Lightning Fabric framework by testing environment detection, rank assignment, and configuration handling, thereby preventing runtime errors in distributed training scenarios.
